title: Low Priority Que due to directX error?
body: I had just got out of a ranked game, went upstairs to get some water, came back and hopped right back into solo q. We get through champ select and then my game refuses to start. Keeps telling me a direct x error has appeared. so I tried  re launching the game and then I get to the point where i reset my pc. I come back to see a remake and 5 20 minute waits. I was just curious about this directx bug? I understand why I got leaver buster bc my power had went out in a norm the day before. But Was just curious how to prevent this from happening again.

replies.body: The Direct X error is usually due to a graphics card update needing to take place! It's best to reinstall, since there was probably an update that took place and you didn't get it. Our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684) does give a run down on how to do this as well!

Thanks! I had a graphic card update but it was weird that that had happened since I hadn't logged out and was literally in a game 5 mins prior to this event occurring. Problem seems solved but still got 3 more leaver buster q's X.X

Hello

Could you please share us your error, the best way to do that is making a screen picture of your error(print screen). Upload it online, [imgur ](http://imgur.com/)for example and then post the picture URL in here.

--

Eu Boards player helper
The problem was solved! I had to update my graphics card. Even though I was just ingame Thanks for the help though!
